languages.text: Нет наслаждения выше, чем обернуть оружие противника против него самого. Десантники Хаоса сильнее целой армии обычных солдат, но даже им не пережить прямого попадания из макропушки.

traits.locale_text: Нет ничего более удовлетворительного, чем обернуть оружие противника против него самого. Космодесантники Хаоса могут быть сильнее армии обычных солдат, но даже им не пережить прямого попадания из макропушки.

languages.text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.
languages.original_text: Нет наслаждения выше, чем обернуть оружие противника против него самого. Десантники Хаоса сильнее целой армии обычных солдат, но даже им не пережить прямого попадания из макропушки.

traits.locale_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than to turn the enemy's weapon against themselves. The Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

There is no greater pleasure in war than to turn the enemy's weapon against themselves. The Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

There is no greater pleasure in war than to turn the enemy's weapon against themselves. The Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

languages.text: 在战争中，最大的乐趣莫过于以彼之道，还施彼身。尽管混沌星际战士比普通的士兵更加强大，但即便是他们，也无法在宏炮的直击下幸存。
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

traits.locale_text: 在战争中，最大的乐趣莫过于以彼之道，还施彼身。尽管混沌星际战士比普通的士兵更加强大，但即便是他们，也无法在宏炮的直击下幸存。

languages.text: Je ne connais pas de plus grand plaisir en temps de guerre que de retourner l'arme d'un ennemi contre lui. Les Marines du Chaos ont beau être plus puissants qu'une armée ordinaire, même eux sont incapables de survivre au tir direct d'un macro-canon.
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

traits.locale_text: Je ne connais pas de plus grand plaisir en temps de guerre que de retourner l'arme d'un ennemi contre lui. Les Marines du Chaos ont beau être plus puissants qu'une armée ordinaire, même eux sont incapables de survivre au tir direct d'un macro-canon.

languages.text: 戦争において、敵の兵器を敵に回すこと以上の喜びはない。ケイオス・マリーンは普通の軍隊より強いが、彼らでさえマクロキャノンの直撃には耐えられない。
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

traits.locale_text: 戦争において、敵の兵器を敵に回すこと以上の喜びはない。ケイオス・マリーンは普通の軍隊より強いが、彼らでさえマクロキャノンの直撃には耐えられない。

languages.text: No hay mayor placer en la guerra que volver las armas del enemigo en su contra. Cada Marine del Caos es más fuertes que un ejército convencional, pero ni siquiera ellos pueden encajar el impacto directo de un macrocañón.
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

traits.locale_text: No hay mayor placer en la guerra que volver las armas del enemigo en su contra. Cada Marine del Caos es más fuertes que un ejército convencional, pero ni siquiera ellos pueden encajar el impacto directo de un macrocañón.

languages.text: Es gibt im Krieg kein größeres Vergnügen, als eine Waffe des Feindes gegen ihn selbst zu richten. Die Chaos Marines sind stärker als eine Armee gewöhnlicher Truppen, doch nicht einmal sie können einen direkten Treffer durch eine Makrokanone überleben.
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt im Krieg kein größeres Vergnügen, als eine Waffe des Feindes gegen ihn selbst zu richten. Die Chaos Marines sind stärker als eine Armee gewöhnlicher Truppen, doch nicht einmal sie können einen direkten Treffer durch eine Makrokanone überleben.

languages.text: Savaşta, düşmanın silahını onların aleyhine çevirmekten daha büyük bir zevk yoktur. Kaos Piyadeleri, sıradan bir asker ordusundan daha güçlü olabilirler ancak onlar bile doğrudan isabet eden bir makro top atışından kurtulamaz.
languages.original_text: There is no greater pleasure in war than turning the enemy's own weapon against them. Chaos Marines are stronger than an army of ordinary troops, but even they cannot survive a direct hit from a macro-cannon.
